title: Fanomenon Short Film Competition 3
screenings: Hyde Park Screen One, Sun 3 Nov 13:45
info: 7 short films | Netherlands, Spain, UK, USA | 2023/24 | 87 minutes
description: We hope you’re ready to be scared, tickled, moved and provoked, because this programme has it all. An A.I.’s assistance turns into chaos, a man’s encounter with a missing woman has him pondering his own existence, whilst a woman wakes up to a disturbing figure stalking her apartment. Elsewhere, 65-year-old Lucita is dying to visit her son in hell, while a couple hides from a menacing group in a Twilight Zone-like world. On a burnt-up Earth, a mother must confront the strange changes affecting her son, and finally, a husband’s breakthrough in reaching his catatonic wife has disturbing consequences.
